messages.message: This is a bummer - annoying to make clean in every service
Thought our local build / run targets did a make clean back in the day. Is that not the case anymore?

I donâ€™t understand exactly how make clean fixes the issue. We run in docker on crafting.
The issues is there is a folder grpc with an __init__.py . There is also grpc.py. The resolution is using the former.

My PR removed that grpc folder, however for some reason the `copy-py-deps` target doesn't seem to update the tracing library with this change if the lib already exists in the build files, as a result the docker build also builds it with an older version of tracing lib resulting in this issue. `make clean` forces it to update the tracing lib in the build files
